Ashley Tribbiani was the imaginary daughter of [[Joey Tribbiani]] and Karen, Joey’s fake wife. She also has an imaginary sister, [[Brittany Tribbiani]]. Joey came up with his fake family in "[[The One With The Chicken Pox]]."
